summary: A critic blackmails a famous musician with his biography filled with the revelations of many of his women.
cast: Bibi Andersson|Harriet Andersson|Eva Dahlbeck|Karin Kavli|Gertrud Fridh|Mona Malm|Barbro Hiort af Ornäs|Allan Edwall|Georg Funkquist|Carl Billquist|Jarl Kulle|Jan Blomberg|Lars-Owe Carlberg|Axel Düberg|Doris Funcke|Göran Graffman|Yvonne Igell|Ulf Johansson|Lars-Erik Liedholm|Gösta Prüzelius|Jan-Olof Strandberg
title: ¡Esas mujeres!
